conbody.p: This tab allows you to define the dating of the selected database object. This tab only applies to the date thesaurus ("Datierungen"). Enter the dating of your thesaurus entry in absolute numbers, as these dates are used by the system to arrange the results of search querries in a chronological order.

ul.li: Beginning: Enter the start date of the period. Use negative numbers for periods before Common Era.
End: Enter the end date of the period. Use negative numbers for periods before Common Era.
Reference: Enter a reference for the dating.
Add entry group: Add a new section, if you want to add a chronology referring to another authority.
Delete entry group: Delete a section.
